title: How can i join PBE?
body: Can someone tell me how? Pleaseeee. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed

Sorry! ^_^ 
I recommend checking around the forums regarding PBE frequently as it may open up again!

Good Luck Summoner!
